name: 3.4.1.13. Feud (Seetlement, continuous)

cf.path: Map Notes#/CF_SEP/PFRPG - Kingdom Building - GM Version

content: Nobles (or other influential rival groups) are bickering. Attempt a Loyalty check. If you succeed, you end the event but Unrest increases by 1. If you fail, Corruption increases by 1, Unrest increases by 1d6, and the event is continuous.
